channel.title: math.GM updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GM updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: On generalized Lambert function
item.description: arXiv:2504.07142v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We consider a particular generalized Lambert function, $y(x)$, defined by the implicit equation $y^\beta = 1 - e^{-xy}$, with $x>0$ and $ \beta > 1$. Solutions to this equation can be found in terms of a certain continued exponential. Asymptotic and structural properties of a non-trivial solution, $y_\beta(x)$, and its connection to the extinction probability of related branching processes are discussed. We demonstrate that this function constitutes a cumulative distribution function of a previously unknown non-negative absolutely continuous random variable.
item.dc:creator: Alexander Kreinin, Andrey Marchenko, Vladimir Vinogradov
